name: Cheesecake Brownie Bars
instructions: Spread in pan and bake at 350 for 10 minutes.
For cheesecake layer, combine cream cheese, sugar, and butter in a large bowl.
Add eggs, milk, flour, and vanilla extract.
Beat at low speed until well blended.
Sprinkle with remaining 1/4 c. chocolate chips.
Bake at 350 for 35-40 minutes or until light golden brown.
